content:
FormatterAssemblyStyle Enum

Definition

Indicates the method that will be used during deserialization for locating and loading assemblies.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum FormatterAssemblyStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
FormatterAssemblyStyle
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Fields

Full

In full mode, the assembly used during deserialization must match exactly the assembly used during serialization. The stem.Reflection.Assembly.Load* method of the Assembly class is used to load the assembly.
Simple

In simple mode, the assembly used during deserialization need not match exactly the assembly used during serialization. Specifically, the version numbers need not match as the stem.Reflection.Assembly.LoadWithPartialName* method is used to load the assembly.
